content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's focus on trying to get the highest rental price possible: As a prime location in the city center, this newly built apartment has a high demand. Considering that, my initial asking price for this 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment is 1200 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating if you find my price reasonable but wish to lower the cost a bit. Yi-Nuo Wang, what rental price do you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the average prices in the city center, I believe 900 Euros per month is a fair price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial aim was to secure a higher price due to the apartment's prime location. However, thank you for your interest in the property, Yi-Nuo Wang. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
